### Greek

::: {layout="[[45,-5,45]]"}

[$\alpha$]{#sign-level}: significance level

[$\beta$]{#beta-risk}: false negative risk, $\beta$-risk

[$\epsilon$]{#epsilon}: residuals

[$\mu_0$, $\mu$]{#truemean-gloss}: the true mean of a population

[$\varphi(x)$]{#pdf-gloss}: probability density function

[$\phi(x)$]{#cdf-gloss}: cumulative probability density function or cumulative distribution function

[$\sigma_0^2$, $\sigma^2$]{#truevariance-gloss}: the true variance of a population

[$\sigma_0$]{#truesd-gloss}: the true standard deviation of a population

:::

### Latin

::: {layout="[[45,-5,45]]"}

[$C_g$]{#Cg}: potential Measurement System Capability Index

[$C_{gk}$]{#Cgk}: Measurement Capability Index with systematic error

[$C_p$]{#Cp}: potential process capability

[$C_{pk}$]{#Cpk}: actual process capability including centering

[$\mathbb{E}[X]$]{#expected-value-gloss}: expected value of random variable $X$

[$k$]{#numpred}: number of predictors in a model

[$n$]{#n-gloss}: number of data points/observations in the sample

[$N$]{#N-gloss}: number of datapoints/observations in the population

[$MSE$]{#mse}: mean squared error

[$P$]{#probabilities}: Probabilities

[$r$]{#r-gloss}: range of values

[$r^2$]{#r2}: Coefficient of determination

[$r^2_{adjusted}$]{#r2adj}: adjusted Coefficient of determination

[$sd$]{#sd-gloss}: the standard deviation of a dataset

[$SSE$]{#sse}: Sum of squared errors as calculated by

[$\mathrm{Var}$]{#Var-gloss}: Variance

[$x_i$]{#xi-gloss}: the $i$th datapoint

[$\bar{x}$]{#mean-gloss}: the mean value of the data

[$X$]{#X}: Predictor Variable / Random Variable

[$Y$]{#Y}: Response Variable

[$\hat{y}$]{#yhat}: predicted value

[$y_i$]{#yi}: true value

:::
